      • processAreaSet

        protected java.util.Set<Area> processAreaSet(XmlPullParser xpp)
                                      throws XmlPullParserException,
                                             java.io.IOException,
                                             NDE2Exception
        So many methods return lists of areas.

        This method returns a Set of areas. That is because the remote call for FindAreas returns a slightly more complex structure than a simple list (as it also attempts some hierarchy in certain cases), and if a simple List was employed, areas would repeat. Set makes it impossible for equal objects to repeat, which is ideal in this scenario.

        Throws:
        XmlPullParserException
        java.io.IOException
        NDE2Exception
        Parameters:
        xpp - The XmlPullParser pointed at a method call that returns a list of Area elements.
        Returns:
        A Set of Areas.
